summary: Airport Operations Safety and Training Coordinator with management experience and exceptional people skills. Versed in accident investigation and analysis to develop action plans and initiatives to address accident trends. Desires a challenging role as a Safety Training Manager.

experience.title: Entrepreneur General Manager
experience.description: Led operations and revenue initiatives for gas station and related services; conducted loss-revenue analysis resulting in a complete turnaround; increased sales by 17% over two years; provided onsite training; managed inventory across multiple databases; oversaw budgets, staff of over 30; contracted with USAID to deliver food and seeds in Haiti; planned transportation, routes, and logistics; monitored and evaluated performance of subordinates.

experience.title: Safety & Training Coordinator
experience.description: Developed and delivered training for more than 15,000 airport employees; planned and evaluated safety and training programs; maintained records; ensured compliance with FAA regulations; coordinated with airlines and government agencies; developed manuals and training materials; performed inspections and incident investigations; oversaw safety budgets and equipment; ensured compliance with safety standards on airfield operations.
